00056     AreaEffect::AreaEffect(const String &name, const Vector3 Location)
00057         : Name (name),
00058           Shape (NULL)
00059     {
00060         TheWorld = World::GetWorldPointer();
00061         CreateGhostObject(Location);
00062     }
00063 
00064     AreaEffect::~AreaEffect()
00065     {
00066         delete Ghost;
00067         if(Shape)
00068             delete Shape;
00069     }
00070 
00071     void AreaEffect::CreateGhostObject(const Vector3 Location)
00072     {
00073         Ghost = new btPairCachingGhostObject();
00074         Ghost->setCollisionFlags(Ghost->getCollisionFlags() + btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00075         Ghost->getWorldTransform().setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00076         Ghost->setUserPointer(this);
00077     }
00078 
00079     void AreaEffect::AddActorToList(ActorBase* Actor)
00080     {
00081         AddedActors.push_back(Actor);
00082         OverlappingActors.push_back(Actor);
00083     }
00084 
00085     void AreaEffect::RemoveActorFromList(ActorBase* Actor)
00086     {
00087         RemovedActors.push_back(Actor);
00088         for( std::list<ActorBase*>::iterator c=OverlappingActors.begin(); c!=OverlappingActors.end(); c++)
00089         {
00090             if ( Actor == (*c) )
00091             {
00092                 OverlappingActors.erase(c);
00093             }
00094         }
00095     }
00096 
00097     void AreaEffect::UpdateActorList()
00098     {
00099         if ( !(AddedActors.empty()) )
00100             AddedActors.clear();
00101         if ( !(RemovedActors.empty()) )
00102             RemovedActors.clear();
00103         btSoftRigidDynamicsWorld* PhysWorld = TheWorld->GetPhysicsManager()->GetPhysicsWorldPointer();
00104         PhysWorld->getDispatcher()->dispatchAllCollisionPairs(Ghost->getOverlappingPairCache(), PhysWorld->getDispatchInfo(), PhysWorld->getDispatcher());
00105 
00106         int OverlappingPairs = Ghost->getOverlappingPairCache()->getNumOverlappingPairs();
00107         btBroadphasePair* Pair = Ghost->getOverlappingPairCache()->getOverlappingPairArrayPtr();
00108         std::list<ActorBase*>::iterator it = OverlappingActors.begin();
00109         // Make a bool vector to keep track of which actors to keep when updating.
00110         std::vector<bool> Tracker;
00111         Tracker.resize(OverlappingActors.size());
00112         std::vector<bool>::iterator bit;
00113         for ( bit = Tracker.begin() ; bit != Tracker.end() ; bit++ )
00114         {
00115             (*bit) = false;
00116         }
00117         // Add objects to the necessary lists as needed.  Also track what needs to be removed for later.
00118         for ( int x=0 ; x<OverlappingPairs ; x++ )
00119         {
00120             // Get the non-ghost object from a given pair and cast it to a usable pointer.
00121             btCollisionObject* ColObj = Pair[x].m_pProxy0->m_clientObject != Ghost ? (btCollisionObject*)(Pair[x].m_pProxy0->m_clientObject) : (btCollisionObject*)(Pair[x].m_pProxy1->m_clientObject);
00122             ActorBase* Actor = (ActorBase*)(ColObj->getUserPointer());
00123             // Check list for the actor in the pair.
00124             for( it = OverlappingActors.begin(), bit = Tracker.begin() ; it != OverlappingActors.end() ; it++, bit++ )
00125             {
00126                 if ( Actor == (*it) )
00127                 {
00128                     (*bit) = true;
00129                     break;
00130                 }
00131             }
00132             if ( it == OverlappingActors.end() )
00133             {
00134                 AddActorToList(Actor);
00135                 Tracker.push_back(true);
00136             }
00137         }
00138         // Verify they are the same size.  Then remove items from the list as necessary.
00139         if ( OverlappingActors.size() == Tracker.size() )
00140         {
00141             std::list<ActorBase*>::iterator sit = OverlappingActors.begin();
00142             for ( bit = Tracker.begin() ; bit != Tracker.end() ; )
00143             {
00144                 if ( (*bit) == false )
00145                 {
00146                     bit = Tracker.erase(bit);
00147                     ActorBase* Act = (*sit);
00148                     RemovedActors.push_back(Act);
00149                     sit = OverlappingActors.erase(sit);
00150                 }else{
00151                     sit++;
00152                     bit++;
00153                 }
00154             }
00155         }
00156     }

00161         Ghost->setCollisionShape(Shape);

00181     void AreaEffect::CreateShapeFromMesh(String Filename, String Group, bool MakeVisible)
00182     {
00183         Ogre::SceneManager* OgreManager = World::GetWorldPointer()->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer();
00184         GraphicsObject = OgreManager->createEntity(Name, Filename, Group);
00185         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = GraphicsObject->getMesh();
00186         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00187         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00188         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00189 
00190         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00191         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00192         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00193 
00194         unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00195         Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00196         unsigned int* indices = new unsigned int[indexData->indexCount];
00197         unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00198         float* pReal = NULL;
00199         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00200         {
00201             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00202             vertices[j].x = *pReal++;
00203             vertices[j].y = *pReal++;
00204             vertices[j].z = *pReal++;
00205         }
00206         vBuffer->unlock();
00207         size_t index_offset = 0;
00208         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00209 
00210         unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00211         unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00212 
00213         if (use32bitindexes)
00214         {
00215             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00216             {
00217                 indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00218             }
00219         }
00220         else
00221         {
00222             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00223             {
00224                 indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00225             }
00226         }
00227         iBuffer->unlock();
00228 
00229         btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00230         btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00231         int i=0;
00232         for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00233         {
00234             vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00235             vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00236             vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00237             trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00238             i+=3;
00239         }
00240         delete[] vertices;
00241         delete[] indices;
00242 
00243         if(MakeVisible)
00244         {
00245             GraphicsNode = OgreManager->createSceneNode();
00246             GraphicsNode->attachObject(GraphicsObject);
00247         }else{
00248             OgreManager->destroyEntity(GraphicsObject);
00249             GraphicsObject = NULL;
00250         }
00251 
00252         Shape = new btGImpactMeshShape(trimesh);
00253         Ghost->setCollisionShape(Shape);
00254     }

00265     }

00309     void TestAE::ApplyEffect()
00310     {
00311         std::vector<ActorBase*>* Added = &(GetAddedActors());
00312         std::vector<ActorBase*>* Removed = &(GetRemovedActors());
00313         std::list<ActorBase*>* Current = &(GetOverlappingActors());
00314 
00315         std::vector<ActorBase*>::iterator AaRIt;
00316         std::list<ActorBase*>::iterator CurrIt;
00317 
00318         ActorBase* Act = NULL;
00319 
00320         if ( !(Added->empty()) )
00321         {
00322             TheWorld->Log("Actors Added to field this frame:");
00323             for ( AaRIt = Added->begin() ; AaRIt != Added->end() ; AaRIt++ )
00324             {
00325                 Act = (*AaRIt);
00326                 TheWorld->Log(Act);
00327             }
00328         }
00329         if ( !(Removed->empty()) )
00330         {
00331             TheWorld->Log("Actors Removed from field this frame:");
00332             for ( AaRIt = Removed->begin() ; AaRIt != Removed->end() ; AaRIt++ )
00333             {
00334                 Act = (*AaRIt);
00335                 TheWorld->Log(Act);
00336             }
00337         }
00338         if ( !(Current->empty()) )
00339         {
00340             TheWorld->Log("Actors Currently in field this frame:");
00341             for ( CurrIt = Current->begin() ; CurrIt != Current->end() ; CurrIt++ )
00342             {
00343                 Act = (*CurrIt);
00344                 TheWorld->Log(Act);
00345             }
00346         }
00347     }

00360     void GravityField::ApplyEffect()
00361     {
00362         std::vector<ActorBase*>* Added = &(GetAddedActors());
00363         std::vector<ActorBase*>* Removed = &(GetRemovedActors());
00364         std::vector<ActorBase*>::iterator It;
00365         PhysicsManager* Physics = TheWorld->GetPhysicsManager();
00366         ActorBase* Act = NULL;
00367 
00368         if ( !(Added->empty()) )
00369         {
00370             for ( It = Added->begin() ; It != Added->end() ; It++ )
00371             {
00372                 Act = (*It);
00373                 Physics->SetIndividualGravity(Act, Grav);
00374             }
00375         }
00376         if ( !(Removed->empty()) )
00377         {
00378             for ( It = Removed->begin() ; It != Removed->end() ; It++ )
00379             {
00380                 Act = (*It);
00381                 Physics->SetIndividualGravity(Act, Physics->GetGravity());
00382             }
00383         }
00384     }
00385 
00386     void GravityField::SetFieldGravity(Vector3 Gravity)
00387     {
00388         Grav = Gravity;
00389     }
00390 
00391     Vector3 GravityField::GetFieldGravity()
00392     {
00393         return Grav;
00394     }
